Pajamas intends to make the recording of track demos easier. Record track stems, preview the track, and finalize it in the form of a WAV audio file.

A track is made up of several track stems. A track stem is a single instance of recorded audio. New track stems are created with the floating action button. Stems can be recorded, played back, and removed. Recording a track stem plays all recorded stems to provide a frame of reference. Once the recorded stems are satisfactory, the track can be finalized. The finalized track is available in WAV format in the application\'s data directory on the device\'s external storage media.
